name: Our Best Cheesecake
author: Philadelphia
summary: Not only is this our best cheesecake-a rich, creamy, cherry-topped showstopper--it's also one of the easiest to make!
ingredients: 1 ¾ cups HONEY MAID Graham Cracker Crumbs
3 (8 ounce) packages PHILADELPHIA Cream Cheese, softened
1 cup BREAKSTONE'S or KNUDSEN Sour Cream
directions: Mix graham crumbs, butter and 1/4 cup sugar; press onto bottom of 9-inch springform pan
Beat cream cheese and remaining sugar in large bowl with mixer until blended
Add sour cream and vanilla; mix well
Add eggs, 1 at a time, beating on low speed after each addition just until blended
or until center is almost set
Run knife around rim of pan to loosen cake; cool before removing rim
Top with pie filling before serving
